features: ✅【Transparent and Non Slip】---The transparent design and non slip cutting board can meet your daily kitchen needs or be shared with family. Transparent design can be well matched with various home decoration styles.

✅【Premium Quality】---The kitchen countertop with a frame is made of high-quality plastic and acrylic. Lightweight, not easily deformed, reusable. It is also designed with slip edges to provide additional stability.

✅【Protective Lid】---If you enjoy cooking with items that may discolor and stain the , such as beetroot or food coloring, or if you enjoy performing craft projects in the kitchen, the acrylic cutting board with a lip is great.
✅【Easy to Cleaning】---Just wash the acrylic cutting board with water, then towel dry immediately.

✅【Wide Range of Uses】---Clear cutting board for countertop can cut bread, fruit, vegetables, meat, etc. This acrylic cutting board can be widely used in our daily life, and is very suitable for processing vegetables, sandwiches, pizza, cakes, and other foods. It is suitable for home kitchens, restaurants, restaurants, and more.

Non Slip The curved lip keeps it in place, won't move around while you're chopping

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Kitchen Countertop Acrylic Cutting Board, Kitchen Clear Cutting Board, Acrylic Non-Slip Clear Cutting Board with Countertop Protector for Dining Room

Kitchen Countertop Acrylic Cutting Board Invisible Cutting Board This transparent cutting board has a design and adopts a transparent appearance, It's almost invisible, won't obscure your beautiful kitchen countertops, which can be well matched with various home decoration styles. Non Slip The curved lip keeps it in place, won't move around while you're chopping Specification: Acrylic Cutting Boards Material: Acrylic Package Include： 1 x Clear Cutting Board Clear Size: 17.7 X 13.77 X 0.98 inches

Acrylic Cutting Boards for Kitchen Counter, Acrylic Cutting Board with Counter Lip, Non Slip Cutting Board for Countertop Protector Easy to Clean: Acrylic cutting boards are very easy to clean, you can rinse it with water or wipe it with a damp cloth(Do NOT use ANY glass cleaner, or any abrasive cleaner. ONLY use dish soap and water to clean the cutting board) Durable and Sturdy： The board is made of high quality acrylic and has good strength and elasticity. Not easily deformed, reusable, and does not require frequent replacement.(Acrylic cutting boards are NOT scratch resistant. Just like all other kinds of cutting boards, knife marks will show.) Wide Range of Uses： The scope of application of Kitchen Cutting Board is very wide, it can cut bread, fruit, vegetables, meat, etc., Wood Cutting Board is very practical. This lip cutting board can be widely used in our daily life, and is very suitable for processing vegetables, sandwiches, pizza, cakes, and other foods. Great Gift Choice： You can sendChopping Board as a great gift for friends, lovers, besties, mothers for various holidays like Thanksgiving Day, Christmas, Mother’s Day, Valentine’s Day, birthday, etc.

Kindly Note： There is a layer of plastic film on the front and back of the acrylic cutting board, please tear it off before use. Also comes with glue. It is convenient to fix the chopping board to make it more convenient for you to use!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Toddler Plate/Cutting board
reviews.reviewText: I actually use this as a plate for my toddler. Works perfect because it hooks to the edge of the table and it’s big enough that he can make a mess and it’s not a huge deal. It also double as a cutting board because I cut up his food right on it and then just move it to the table when it’s time to eat. Very easy to clean but too big for our dishwasher unfortunately but no big deal.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Super cute & durable!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This product was a little smaller than I expected it to be but nonetheless perfect for the price. It is truly see through and it’s super easy to clean and start chopping again. Goes great with my marble countertop. Shipping was fast!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: so beautiful in my kitchen. The transparency and durability is excellent. Provides a modern sleek look

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This was delivered today. I used it to prep veggies for dinner and it’s already ruined with cut marks. It’s way too soft if I can’t even cut on it without ruining it. Don’t buy this cutting board unless you plan not to use it as a cutting board!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Both came cracked
reviews.reviewText: I was super excited about finding a more aesthetic cutting board that I could keep out without it being an eye sore.Unfortunately it arrived cracked so , I ordered a replacement and that one was cracked as well but worse .. so I’m having to send both back which is unfortunate and inconvenient.Wouldn’t recommendBoth came quickly and in a timely manner.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I put this to the right of my sink where I tend to cut-oops! Now this board reside next to the sink and I can use it as it's intended-to cut! So far it works and cleans well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I liked this product at first, but the rubber feet came off rather quickly and it won’t stay in place (slides around). Would not recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the convenience!
reviews.reviewText: So easy to prep vegetables and fruit with this right on the counter. Perfect size for what I needed.

Es exactamente como la descripción. Me llegó un poco rayada pero aún así me la quedé.Considero que el precio es excesivo para lo que es.Cabe resaltar que una vez empiezas a usarla se raya cada corte que se hace sobre la plancha.
La tabla es delgada y se raya muy facil, de ahi en mas, buen producto,
